attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He has completely lost any integrity that he may of had with his amateurish bungling of the economy, his handling of 'his' bankers & unemployment by selling out jobs to people overseas.
He was NEVER voted in PM by the public in the first place and is a total waste of space.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
